actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Judiciary.
Senate Committee on Judiciary discharged by Voice Vote.
Rereferred to Senate Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB; Treasury Department; Health and Human Services Department.

official_title: A bill to Amend title XVIII of the Social Security with respect to judicial review of a decision by the Provider Reimbursement Review Board.

summary.text: Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to permit judicial review of actions of the Provider Reimbursement Review Board, involving more than one provider, in the judicial district of the principal party as well as in the United States District Court for the District of Columbia.

titles.title: A bill to Amend title XVIII of the Social Security with respect to judicial review of a decision by the Provider Reimbursement Review Board.
